attributes.action: Make Trolley Belts A Legal Requirement For All SuperMarkets/Shops
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, there is no law. So shops are not checking belts are safe nor putting them on trolleys.
I ask that it be required by law to ensure belts are provided for children. 
To ensure no major accidents happen. Safety is number one.
attributes.background:
Make trolley belts be a legal requirement for ALL shopping trolleys to ensure safety of children. 

Safety is number one priority
